blogs.title: JSON SERVER
blogs.author: foo
blogs.body: I am writing to express my interest in the Ruby on Rails Developer role at Loopers Insight. As a recent graduate with a passion for web development and a strong foundation in programming, I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and enthusiasm to your team.
